channel.title: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)
channel.description:
Well, I've been working slowly, currently this is my only project I'm working on right now.
[size=24pt]99% Credits to Luke132 of Rune-Server[/size]
I said that off the bat because unlike the other 2009Remade thing, I'm using Luke's previous work and content so all the skills (other than hunter, construction, and summoning work) and theres Barrows, 63 Wave Fight Cave, and an attempt at GodWars. I've been adding small things to the game to make it more professional and also adding systems to make the future easier.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/wbbfyf.png[/img]
Working Bank Space Indicators [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/143gjdl.png[/img]
Working Item Weight [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/epnnuw.png[/img]
My pride and joy, a dialogue system that works with the previous dialogue system that Luke had implemented (this one is much simpler)
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/208fjnk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/e0iln9.png[/img]
Works with options and everything else!
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/znnh4j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/316mbyt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2lsfo6f.png[/img]
Shop dialogue :)
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/907q8i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/34y4ldt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2u920x4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/5uk3nb.png[/img]
Object and Npc Examines
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2e17uol.png[/img]
[font=arial black][size=18pt]If anyone is willing to help me get the HD 530 Client to run on my computer (its a mac) I'd gladly appreciate it
Also, if someone can do grand exchange saving and loading too, i'd appreciate that ALOT.[/size][/font]

item.title: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

south-park:

Make sure to run in an IDE (not sure why but HD doesn’t work when running with a batch file).

I did, still don’t work.

Read full topic

item.source: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)

item.title: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:11, topic:536746”][quote author=Docent link=topic=655562.msg4389165#msg4389165 date=1386814554]

for HD client open up the source folder find ClientLoader.java

and look at this

      props.put("worldid", wld);
      props.put("members", "1");
      props.put("modewhat", "0");
      props.put("modewhere", "0");
      props.put("safemode", "0");
      props.put("game", "0");
      props.put("js", "1");
      props.put("lang", "0");
      props.put("affid", "0");
      props.put("lowmem", "0");
      props.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA");

Lowmem is for High Detail or Low Detail but thats probably not it.

anyways if you google rune-server 530 hd client you could find a bunch here is one for example
http://www.mediafire.com/download/za4pjilfo089n94/530+hd+fs+deob.jar

http://www.mediafire.com/download/dah5gke7x7gb9g8/530+dlls.rar

It’s nothing to do with that, it’s his .dlls (idk if it’s the same for macs). Just update them and it should work (also use the cache from ScapeEmu).

Do I have to use Flamables 530 Hd Client or can I use a standard 530 client because Flamables is not able to be compiled successfully.

Umm… Yes it can? Use an IDE… :palm:

Oh cuz when i compile w/o an IDE it has a bunch of “can’t find OpenGL” errors.

EDIT: Ah, apparently, after speaking with my father, .dll files are PC only, I have to get the JOGL jar files and make the compile.sh use those libraries
[/quote]

Use the one Flamable released.[/quote]

Yes, I have got the client to compile, BUT the HD still doesn’t work. I even got the correct “dlls” which for macs are “jnilib” however the HD doesn’t work even with that.

Read full topic
item.source: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)

item.title: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“Docent, post:10, topic:536746”][quote author=south-park link=topic=655562.msg4389153#msg4389153 date=1386812578]

for HD client open up the source folder find ClientLoader.java

and look at this

      props.put("worldid", wld);
      props.put("members", "1");
      props.put("modewhat", "0");
      props.put("modewhere", "0");
      props.put("safemode", "0");
      props.put("game", "0");
      props.put("js", "1");
      props.put("lang", "0");
      props.put("affid", "0");
      props.put("lowmem", "0");
      props.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA");

Lowmem is for High Detail or Low Detail but thats probably not it.

anyways if you google rune-server 530 hd client you could find a bunch here is one for example
http://www.mediafire.com/download/za4pjilfo089n94/530+hd+fs+deob.jar

http://www.mediafire.com/download/dah5gke7x7gb9g8/530+dlls.rar

It’s nothing to do with that, it’s his .dlls (idk if it’s the same for macs). Just update them and it should work (also use the cache from ScapeEmu).

Do I have to use Flamables 530 Hd Client or can I use a standard 530 client because Flamables is not able to be compiled successfully.

Umm… Yes it can? Use an IDE… :palm:
[/quote]

Oh cuz when i compile w/o an IDE it has a bunch of “can’t find OpenGL” errors.

EDIT: Ah, apparently, after speaking with my father, .dll files are PC only, I have to get the JOGL jar files and make the compile.sh use those libraries[/quote]

Use the one Flamable released.

item.title: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“south-park, post:9, topic:536746”][quote author=Docent link=topic=655562.msg4389138#msg4389138 date=1386808942]

for HD client open up the source folder find ClientLoader.java

and look at this

      props.put("worldid", wld);
      props.put("members", "1");
      props.put("modewhat", "0");
      props.put("modewhere", "0");
      props.put("safemode", "0");
      props.put("game", "0");
      props.put("js", "1");
      props.put("lang", "0");
      props.put("affid", "0");
      props.put("lowmem", "0");
      props.put("settings", "kKmok3kJqOeN6D3mDdihco3oPeYN2KFy6W5--vZUbNA");

Lowmem is for High Detail or Low Detail but thats probably not it.

anyways if you google rune-server 530 hd client you could find a bunch here is one for example
http://www.mediafire.com/download/za4pjilfo089n94/530+hd+fs+deob.jar

http://www.mediafire.com/download/dah5gke7x7gb9g8/530+dlls.rar

It’s nothing to do with that, it’s his .dlls (idk if it’s the same for macs). Just update them and it should work (also use the cache from ScapeEmu).

Do I have to use Flamables 530 Hd Client or can I use a standard 530 client because Flamables is not able to be compiled successfully.
[/quote]

Umm… Yes it can? Use an IDE… :palm:[/quote]

Oh cuz when i compile w/o an IDE it has a bunch of “can’t find OpenGL” errors.

EDIT: Ah, apparently, after speaking with my father, .dll files are PC only, I have to get the JOGL jar files and make the compile.sh use those libraries

item.title: [530] RuneScape 2008-09 Recreation (The fun parts and the simple things)
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Well, I’ve been working slowly, currently this is my only project I’m working on right now.

[size=24pt]99% Credits to Luke132 of Rune-Server[/size]

I said that off the bat because unlike the other 2009Remade thing, I’m using Luke’s previous work and content so all the skills (other than hunter, construction, and summoning work) and theres Barrows, 63 Wave Fight Cave, and an attempt at GodWars. I’ve been adding small things to the game to make it more professional and also adding systems to make the future easier.

Working Bank Space Indicators

Working Item Weight

My pride and joy, a dialogue system that works with the previous dialogue system that Luke had implemented (this one is much simpler)


Works with options and everything else!



Shop dialogue




Object and Npc Examines

[font=arial black][size=18pt]If anyone is willing to help me get the HD 530 Client to run on my computer (its a mac) I’d gladly appreciate it

Also, if someone can do grand exchange saving and loading too, i’d appreciate that ALOT.[/size][/font]

Read full topic
